short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically redirect from Amazon to AmazonSmile to support your favorite charity when you shop.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Amazon donates 0.5% of the price of eligible products to a charity of your choice when you use the AmazonSmile website. Donate and Smile redirects you to AmazonSmile so that you don't have to remember to go to the right website.
